照.definition: according to; in accordance with; to shine; to illuminate; to reflect; to look at (one's reflection); to take (a photo); photo; as requested; as before

照亮.definition: to illuminate; to light up; lighting

照例.definition: as a rule; as usual; usually

照做.definition: to do as instructed; to comply

照像機.definition: variant of 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1]; camera

照原樣.definition: to copy; to follow the original shape; faithful restoration

照單全收.definition: to accept without question; to take sth at face value

照壁.definition: a screen wall across the gate of a house (for privacy)

照妖鏡.definition: magic mirror for revealing goblins; fig. way of seeing through a conspiracy

照射.definition: to shine on; to light up; to irradiate

照應.definition: to look after; to take care of; to attend to

照料.definition: to tend; to take care of sb

照明.definition: lighting; illumination; to light up; to illuminate

照會.definition: a diplomatic note; letter of understanding or concern exchanged between governments

照樣.definition: as before; (same) as usual; in the same manner; still; nevertheless

照準.definition: request granted (formal usage in old document); to aim (gun)

照理.definition: according to reason; usually; in the normal course of events; to attend to

照發.definition: approved for distribution; to provide (wages etc) as usual (e.g. while an employee is on maternity leave)

照看.definition: to look after; to attend to; to have in care

照管.definition: to look after; to provide for

照約定.definition: according to agreement; as arranged; as stipulated

照舊.definition: as before; as in the past

照葫蘆畫瓢.definition: lit. to draw a dipper with a gourd as a model (idiom); fig. to copy slavishly

照護.definition: care; treatment (e.g. nursing care); to look after

照貓畫虎.definition: lit. drawing a tiger using a cat as a model (idiom); fig. to follow a model and get things more or less right but without capturing the spirit of the subject; uninspired imitation

照買不誤.definition: to keep on buying (a product) regardless (of price increases, adverse publicity etc)

照辦.definition: to follow the rules; to do as instructed; to play by the book; to comply with a request

照顧.definition: to take care of; to show consideration; to attend to; to look after

照騙.definition: (Internet slang) flattering photo (pun on 照片[zhao4 pian4]); photoshopped picture
